mapper.select: SELECT isbn, md_stat, book_title, cont, papr_pric, e_pric, papr_point, e_point, prod_md_com, prod_md_com_desc, rating, pub_day, book_desc, book_info, intro_award, recommend, book_inside, pub_review, tot_page_num, tot_book_num, pre_start_page, pre_end_page, ebook_url, reg_date, reg_id, up_date, up_id FROM book_shop.book WHERE isbn = #{isbn}
